Notable People

Dracwyn

  • Griegious Pardington: King of Evedale [Human]
    • Emmalene Pardington: Princess of Evedale [Human]
  • Thulmyr Ebonsteel: Marquis of Dracwyn [Dwarf]
  • Malcis: Marquess of Dracwyn [Tiefling]
  • Alyiara Daevon'lyr: Marquess of Dracwyn (post-drow) [Drow]
  • Mortag: Wizard trapped in a painting
  • Professor Richard Mortimer: Machinist from Istovia [Human]

Fallwinter

  • Marcus Vailan: Member of the Court of Fallwinter [Elf]
  • Lucius Vikander: Count of Fallwinter [Human]

Malaemor

  • Amilicia Dalael: Drow leader (post-drow) [Drow]
  • Gothras Chemra: Administrator of the Department of Personnel Acquisitions [Drow]

Lazhani

  • Iris Lazarov: Necromancer [Human]
    • Maksim Lazarov: Iris' husband [Human]
    • Sophia Lazarov: Iris' daughter [Human]
    • Argus Barabus: Iris' older brother [Human]
    • Helena Rholer-Barabus: Iris' younger sister [Human]
      • Jahled Rholer: Helena's husband [Human]
  • Elarys Brighton: Seamstress (post-drow) [Human]
